The Washington Post.title: Design and Graphics Intern
The Washington Post.desc: Collaborated with designers and graphics reporters to design and develop web presentations of enterprise projects. Built bespoke storytelling tools and components for the Post's website. Created interactive graphics for data-driven politics stories.

Howard Center for Investigative Journali.title: Fellow, Data Reporter
Howard Center for Investigative Journali.desc: Ran advanced data analyses in R and Python to develop promising leads and story ideas. Filed public records requests to gather data. Designed and built interactive graphics to supplement storytelling.

Capital News Service.title: Data and Graphics Reporter
Capital News Service.desc: Designed graphics and programmed interactive maps and visualizations. Built Python web scrapers to automate data collection. Created news apps and long-form web presentations to present data-driven stories in engaging and visual ways.

NBC News.title: Data Graphics Intern
NBC News.desc: Pitched, reported and wrote data-driven stories. Analyzed data sets to develop story ideas. Built engaging charts, maps and graphics for stories to explain the news visually.
